challengeName: Proof Of Concept - Lunar Mapping Image Generation
detailedRequirements:
Task Overview

The purpose of this project is to develop an application that will utilize Hadoop-MapReduce to perform image processing that transforms the raw images taken by Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO) to geo-referenced and mosaicked images that can be displayed on the LMMP (www.lmmp.nasa.gov) as rich visualization layers which are highly valuable for future mission planning and development.

This is a Proof Of Concept challenge to generate mosaicked image from raw images.

Task Requirements

Provided System Architecture documents and Updated PDS API, you will need to address the following from system architecture :

  • 2.4 Image data, kernelization and mosaic generation

Basically, Hadoop is out of scope of this challenge, and you are expected to build a single command line utility (sequential processing of image generation) to generate moasic images :

  • Build a command line utliity that pass information about images to be mosaicked :
    • The params to be passed are : region (bounding coordinates), illumination and camera angle, and image collection time, useREST (flag).
    • Retrieve the images using PDS API directly or via REST API - depends on the useREST flag.
    • Kerenelize images :
      • Convert the original PDS image using lronac2isis function to cube (definition)
    • Using the kerenelized cubes, apply the following algorithm to convert each cubes into mosaicked image : 
      • Using USGS Mosaicking convert provided list of cubes to the resulting mosaic image using automos function.
    • Store the result image into file system.
    • Return back the path of the image to the user (prompt it in command line) to notify user that operation was completed
    • In all above steps, perform logging for all information, and logging of the timing needed to execute each step. The purpose is to understand how much each step is taking.

Provided Code and Documentation

  • PDS API - please send to support@topcoder.com requesting access if you don't have one.
  • System Architecture documents
  • PDS API Module Architecture documents

Deliverables

  • The files that implement above application
  • Detailed deployment document
